text: Karl Allgöwer (born 5 January 1957) is a German former footballer who played as a midfielder.. Retrieved 21 February 2010. ==Honours== ===International=== ;West Germany * FIFA World Cup: Runner-up 1986 ===Club=== ;VfB Stuttgart * UEFA Europa League: Runner-up 1988–89 * Bundesliga: 1983–84 * DFB-Pokal: Runner-up 1985–86 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:1986 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Karl Allgöwer
